content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to check the health status of all services (ACCOUNT, LEDGER, CARD) and list each with their status. To comply with requirements:

1. Must check each service individually using their respective agents
2. Collect health status from each service
3. Report individual statuses in a list format
4. Use exact "HEALTHY"/"UNHEALTHY" labels

Using previous successful pattern:
- account_agent for ACCOUNT health
- ledger_agent for LEDGER health
- card_agent for CARD health

Need to execute all three checks before compiling the list.</thinking>

<thinking>The user requested health status for all services with individual listings. The tool results show:

- Account service: 200 OK (healthy)
- Ledger service: 200 OK (healthy)
- Card service: 200 OK (healthy)

All services returned successful health checks. Following protocol:

1. List each service with status
2. Use exact "HEALTHY" labels
3. Maintain order: ACCOUNT, LEDGER, CARD

Will compile the results into a formatted list.</thinking> - ACCOUNT: HEALTHY  
- LEDGER: HEALTHY  
- CARD: HEALTHY
